body_html: There's already a way to do it. The widget that's used to visualize the graph in TensorBoard is embeddable into Jupyter notebook: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38189119/simple-way-to-visualize-a-tensorflow-graph-in-jupyter/38192374#38192374
